channel.title: What do?
channel.description: Basically, this girl that I've been friends with for ages (one of my best friends, one of them friends you love in a friend way) was thinking about going back out with her ex (a pathetic little so and so who had to beg her to even consider him, but she discovered that she liked him after going out o.o) but before he had even asked her, he put it on facebook and told everyone that they were going out. Now she's practically begging that I don't do anything, and I was just going to have a word with him about it, until he started telling everyone he was going to "batter" me. But now he's got about 10 of his friends in to it, and I'm a rugby player, yeah I could take them all on, but I'm just wondering if you think it's worth it. This is not a troll.

item.title: What do?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Women, hump and dump. I was like you awhile back but I have found the light.

No.

Roxee™:

Fuck the other guy bro, just give your lady friend a good slap on the ass and ‘ride’ her all the way back to the station ya her’ now?

Hell no.

Read full topic

item.title: What do?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:55, topic:379147”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=474997.msg3475267#msg3475267 date=1295647769]
No, I’m 14 and he’s 13. And yeah, if it does kick off (he burst into tears when I confronted him today) then I’ll make sure it’s video’d.
[/quote]
So you lied? Because 13 year olds are definitely in middle school. Not high school. And I call bull shit on tears. Not even a raging homosexual would cry when you confronted them about their sexuality.[/quote]

Not in England they’re not.

And anyway, seeing as he went around telling everyone about how he was going to beat me up, and so I said that he had to swing the first punch (Probably a week suspension if I do) and he hasn’t done anything so far.

Read full topic

item.title: What do?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Oh dear god.

Just stay out of it.
She’s your friend, it’s her choice, but I do see where you’re coming from, however, it’s unnecessary. He’s saying they fucked when they didn’t, so shouldn’t that ring a bell to you immediately? He’s desperate for popularity. At that age, having sex is like having a Mewtwo Pokemon card in Pre School, of course people are going to lie about it, desperate for attention. Just let him go on his own merry way and laugh when he realizes just how pathetic this whole stunt really is.

Jesus, it’s just middle school. It’s not worth posting unless it’s like a 7th grader in my district getting pregnant.

Read full topic

item.title: What do?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:33, topic:379147”][quote author=casey. link=topic=474997.msg3473435#msg3473435 date=1295476869]

[/quote]

so cul postin’ a 2 yr old pic bro

And at the “there’s 10 of them”, they’re all at least a foot, a foot and a half smaller than me, and weigh around 4 stone less than me.

And the reason that they split up is because he just turned all wierd, saying he’d fucked her and stuff (when he hadn’t).[/quote]
So that makes you… 12? Anyways, to me it sounds like middle school bull shit. A lot of drama. I myself hate drama and would stay the fuck out of it. If the guy wants a fight, I don’t turn down a good fight, but I don’t start them either. Just do as blake said. He’s a smart guy. If he punches you, kick his ass. If he runs his mouth, just ignore it or say something smart back. Also if you fight the 10 guys I want to see the video. And don’t say there’s no video. There’s always a viddo when you fight 10 people.

Read full topic
